title: League loading screen wont load, then suddenly goes black screen.
body: This happened to me not to long ago and wouldn't let me tab out and it was a black screen and would not load. I have never had this problem before and I got leaver LP lost. Please help. I had internet with a stream running in the background and i could hear my friend talking in the discord calling and my computer has no problems and did a PC scan yesterday with nothing found. Lost alot of LP too...

replies.body: I'm here to help!  This black screen at the loading screen you see is likely caused by a connection problem.  Your network might specifically be having trouble reaching our game server, regardless if your internet is fine elsewhere.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  Test it out in a custom as well so you don't get any penalties or LP loss.  Let me know if you have any questions!
